page.title: 12LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: Harris's Newsagents is at 40 Kinson Road, Wallisdown and is open 7 days a week from 6.00am to 6.00pm. Its best selling product is newspapers and there are no problems with deliveries. They have no restrictions when storing goods and this does not limit the type and quantity of goods ordered. Mr. Harris employs 8 staff, mostly paperboys, who go around putting ordered papers through the customers letter boxes. Larger shops, such as supermarkets, effect his business by selling things more cheaply than he can as they can work on lower profit margins. He prefers to run his own shop because he would rather work for himself than anyone else. He feels the future of his small shop is secure if it is run properly.
